aboutmeSection.title: I'm a Software Developer with 3 years of experience specializing in building scalable web applications with React and TypeScript on the frontend, and Node.js on the backend.

backgroundSubSection.title: My Background üöÄ
backgroundSubSection.text: With a background in higher mathematics and project management, I've honed a research mindset and developed strong problem-solving abilities. My education has equipped me with a deep understanding of workflow, task estimation, and efficient organization. This foundation has shaped me into a developer who not only writes clean code but also approaches challenges with analytical precision and strategic planning.

languagesSubSection.title: Multilingual Skills üåç
languagesSubSection.text: I'm fluent in both English and French at an Upper-Intermediate level. Whether it‚Äôs a casual conversation or a technical discussion, I can navigate these languages with confidence, ensuring smooth communication in diverse settings.

project1.title: Pulse
project1.description: It is a platform for conducting auctions for the sale and purchase of biogas. It provides functionality for publishing auctions, submitting bids, viewing results in graphical format, and notifying users. Tools for administrators are included, such as user management and monitoring of operations.

project2.title: G3T
project2.description: G3T is an internal application used to manage gas market operations and transmit trade data. My role involved front-end development ensuring smooth user interaction and data visualization. The system's core functionalities include real-time trade monitoring, access to historical trade data, cancellation and suspension of trades, and integrated workflow tools for managing market operations.

project3.title: Relatio
project3.description: I developed a lot of landing pages for this dating app that includes interactive components like sliders, quizzes, and forms and etc to engage users globally. The page is designed for optimal user experience, focusing on easy navigation and effective call-to-action elements to drive sign-ups. This project highlights my skills in creating dynamic, user-friendly interfaces tailored for high conversion rates.
